author: Jeffm436
post_text: January 24, 2015 at 10:03 PM#1Is there a way to write a macro that would do the same thing as pressing "sACN Output Active" in the network Protocols window?Any advice would be great.Thanks

posts.author: Jeffm436
posts.post_text: January 24, 2015 at 10:03 PM#1Is there a way to write a macro that would do the same thing as pressing "sACN Output Active" in the network Protocols window?Any advice would be great.Thanks

posts.author: bundao
posts.post_text: January 24, 2015 at 10:22 PM#2Assign Root 4.4 /OutActive=On"=Toggle" doesnt seem to work for these so use "=On" or "=Off" in separate macros

posts.author: Jeffm436
posts.post_text: January 25, 2015 at 1:44 AM#3This worked perfectly.Thanks for your help.

title: Macro to turn on and off sACN
